data.name: Rev:Heavy Manta
data.author: Bredroll
data.description:
[b]Requires the Revolution 1.3+[/b] [b]Compatible with Revolution 1.6[/b] By popular demand, the Manta (re)gains use of two more wing hardpoints for bombs and missiles.
Changes:
Fixed manta weapon options to match updated revolution 1.3 manta.
4 Manta wing hardpoints that can take fuel, missiles and bombs 1 Centreline hardpoint that can take fuel and bombs and rockets 1 Internal gun option for 20mm autocannon
Uses library_custom_1.lua
